page.title: 14OLD SCHOOL,NEW SCHOOL.
page.content: {OLD SCHOOL_ST.HELEN'S AUCKLAND PRIMARY {as seen by Michael Robinson,age 10. The school was built in 1910 and is 75 years old.It is made from red brick and blue-grey roof tiles.There are 14 classrooms,a large hall and a small hall in the main building.Although the school is very old-fashioned,new parts have been added such as toilets, kit- chen,and staffroom,and a nursery has been built separate from the school. All the new parts have flat roofs. The decoration is very poor,especially where the roof has leaked. There is a playground and a field. A busy main road runs past the school.
